list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a large edible fish that is a popular game fish, much prized for its pink flesh. Salmon mature in the sea but migrate to freshwater streams to spawn.
any of a number of fishes that resemble the true salmons.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cotton checked throw in cream and salmon pink
